meanings.sent1: The anelastic rubber band stayed stretched out and did not snap back.
meanings.sent2: The anelastic fabric did not bounce back when pulled.
meanings.sent3: The anelastic balloon refused to inflate no matter how hard I blew into it.
meanings.sent4: Her anelastic patience finally snapped like a brittle twig.
meanings.sent5: The anelastic slinky just flopped on the stairs without springing back.

meanings.definition: Not capable of returning to its original shape after being deformed.
meanings.sent1: The anelastic clay sculpture remained misshapen after being squished.
meanings.sent2: The anelastic foam cushion stayed dented where someone sat.
meanings.sent3: The anelastic cookie dough refused to rise in the oven, staying flat as a pancake.
meanings.sent4: His anelastic resolve crumbled under pressure, never regaining its former strength.
meanings.sent5: The anelastic rubber ball stayed squashed after being squeezed, never regaining its round shape.

meanings.definition: Not able to recover quickly from stress or strain.
meanings.sent1: The anelastic athlete struggled to bounce back after a tough match.
meanings.sent2: The anelastic plant wilted and took a long time to perk up after being under-watered.
meanings.sent3: The anelastic phone battery drained quickly and took ages to recharge.
meanings.sent4: Her anelastic emotions lingered heavily, unable to shake off the sadness.
meanings.sent5: The anelastic rubber band snapped easily under pressure, unable to withstand the strain.
